customer_addr:
9600 N Oceanshore Blvd.
Saint Augustine, FL 32080

citations.narrative:
Upon review of the last year of water quality records, From November 21, 2023 - January 2, 2024 the coliform testing was
performed every 2 weeks, not every week as required by the Animal Welfare Act. The facilities in-house testing kits were
backordered and they were unable to get supplies to complete the required weekly testing. The facility must maintain
water quality which is not detrimental to the health and well-being of the animals. Water samples must be taken and
tested weekly for coliforms and records of all such test results must be made available for review by APHIS officials.
Correct by January 17, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.106(b)(3) 
   
Water quality. 
Upon review of the last year of water quality records, From November 21, 2023 - January 2, 2024 the coliform testing was 
performed every 2 weeks, not every week as required by the Animal Welfare Act. The facilities in-house testing kits were 
backordered and they were unable to get supplies to complete the required weekly testing. The facility must maintain 
water quality which is not detrimental to the health and well-being of the animals. Water samples must be taken and 
tested weekly for coliforms and records of all such test results must be made available for review by APHIS officials. 
Correct by January 17, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
